short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plays an audio when a user solves a LeetCode puzzle successfully

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LeetMusic is a fun and engaging Chrome extension designed for puzzle enthusiasts who love to celebrate their victories with a burst of color and music. When you successfully solve a puzzle on supported websites, our extension adds an extra layer of excitement by playing a triumphant tune and showering your screen with confetti.

Key Features:

Automatic Music Playback: LeetMusic detects when you've completed a puzzle and plays an uplifting tune to celebrate your achievement.

Confetti Display: Enjoy a vibrant, colorful confetti explosion on your screen, (coming soon: with adjustable settings for confetti size, speed, and duration.)

Puzzle Site Compatibility: LeetMusic works seamlessly with LeetCode and will support a growing list of popular puzzle websites, enhancing your solving experience across multiple platforms.

Easy Setup & Configuration: Just install and refresh your page. You're good to go.

Lightweight & Unobtrusive: LeetMusic runs smoothly in the background without disrupting your puzzle-solving experience, ensuring you can focus on conquering challenges while we take care of the celebrations.

Bring an extra dimension of joy and motivation to your puzzle-solving adventures with LeetMusic â€“ the perfect companion for enthusiasts seeking a more immersive and rewarding experience.
